actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to set the compensation of services for Members of Congress, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that the Congress shall make no law affecting the compensation for services for Members of Congress. Requires the compensation of Members of Congress to be adjusted to correspond to any increase or decrease in the median income of all U.S. citizens on January 1 of each year of the first session of a Congress.

titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to set the compensation of services for Members of Congress, and for other purposes.
